name: difxp2ss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqsstri(cxp(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cxp(c0, c1), cdif(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cxp(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cxp(c0, c1))
-| wceq(cxp(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cdif(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))
-| wss(cdif(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), cxp(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cxp(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cxp(c0, c1))
-| wceq(cxp(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cdif(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))
-| wss(cdif(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), cxp(c0, c1))

body.origin: |- wceq(cxp(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cdif(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cxp(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cxp(c0, c1))
-| wss(cdif(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), cxp(c0, c1))

body.origin: |- wss(cdif(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), cxp(c0, c1))

comment: Difference law for Cartesian products. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Jul-2023.)
